snippet: White House officials described as dire the effects of the automatic, across-the-board cuts to defense and domestic spending that will kick in on March 1 unless Congress and President Obama agree on a plan to put them off.
abstract: White House officials described as dire the effects of the automatic, across-the-board cuts to defense and domestic spending that will kick in on March 1 unless Congress and President Obama agree on a plan to put them off.

headline.main: White House Delivers Dire Warning About Automatic Cuts
